cmp: 发 (to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop, hair)
mng: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc, to dial, to allocate, to set aside (money), to poke (the fire), to pluck (a string instrument), to turn round, classifier: group, batch

exm.mng: to assign, to allocate, to transfer (money to an account)
to give instructions, to give advice
to send (products), to allocate, to commit (funds), to channel (goods)
to pull out, to allocate (funds), to dial
to push aside, to part, to brush away
